details.sectionContent: This workshop will teach you to build your own robot controlled by your smart phone.

We will teach you how to make a robot with a Bluetooth module inside it. We will then connect your robot with your smartphone through Bluetooth. After that you will be able to control the robot through gestures in your mobile

Bluetooth controlled robot involves the operation of robot with the gestures done from your smartphone. This workshop helps participants to understand the concept and use of Arduino, BT module and Gyroscope module.Gestures done by you using your smartphones will control your robot.

Students will gain practical hands on experience with the following components.
Development board, Bluetooth HC â€“ 05, Gyroscope.
Step by step development of robot and establishment of communication.

Robot development components
Embedded robotics development board
Batteries
Tools
